headline: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Supermicro, Nike Shares Rise; Albemarle Stock Falls
summary: The S&P 500 was little changed on Monday, July 28, 2025, as investors absorbed the U.S.-EU trade deal and braced for this week's earnings, economic, and Fed news.

raw.headline: S&P 500 Gains & Losses Today: Supermicro, Nike Shares Rise; Albemarle Stock Falls
raw.summary: The S&P 500 was little changed on Monday, July 28, 2025, as investors absorbed the U.S.-EU trade deal and braced for this week's earnings, economic, and Fed news.

headline: Albermarle Stock Drops 10%. Lithium Rally Is ‘Transitory.’
summary: Shares of lithium producer Albemarle fell on Monday.  Coming into the week, Albemarle was up almost 30% from April lows.  Helping was a rally in benchmark lithium prices, which have risen this year about $8,200 a metric ton to $10,300.
